metadata.synopsis: Karlach has been sent to prison after deciding to attack Gortash while the steelwatcher is present and now has to be recruited again in Wyrm's prison if players get to free her. She is unhappy - she tried to go after him and failed. She's beating herself up inside and that's manifesting itself in anger.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Recruit Karlach as a companion in Act 3 and use oe SendKarlachToPrison.

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: Please tell me you've seen sense.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Come on - let's get out of here.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Please tell me you've seen sense.

73.speaker: Karlach
73.text: You don't control me. No one controls me. Accept that or don't.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.text: Finally. Let's get out of here.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: We need to talk about what happened out there.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I told you not to go after Gortash, and you went anyway.

25.speaker: Karlach
25.text: Didn't realise I needed your permission to kill the fucker who ruined my life.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: You don't. But we have to stick together if we're going to survive this place.

15.speaker: Karlach
15.text: Then get on board. Gortash dies - the moment we have the chance.

99.speaker: Karlach
99.text: I won't go rushing in again, but you have to promise we'll kill him before this is said and done.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: It's not about permission. It's about strategy.

31.speaker: Karlach
31.text: I get that. I didn't do myself any favours getting tossed in this pit anyway.

29.speaker: Karlach
29.text: Look - I won't go rogue again, but I'm not letting that fucker off the hook.

79.speaker: Karlach
79.text: We'll get him together - as soon as we can. Right?

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I should've stopped you from going after Gortash like that.

9.speaker: Karlach
9.text: You couldn't have. I had him in my sights - I could smell him.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: We can't go rushing in after Gortash again. We might need him alive.

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: You better be damn sure about that. And that 'need' better have a time limit.

57.speaker: Karlach
57.text: Promise me we'll kill him before this is said and done.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: The Steel Watch overpowered you. We can't let that happen again.

23.speaker: Karlach
23.text: Yeah. We'll need to take them down if we want to get a clear shot at Gortash.

61.speaker: Karlach
61.text: I won't go rogue again, but I'm not letting that fucker off the hook - that's for damn sure.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: The Steel Watch made short work of you. We need to be more careful going forward.

63.speaker: Karlach
63.text: Those bastards are tough. I won't let that happen again. But I will stick something sharp in Gortash's heart the second it's safe to do.

101.speaker: Player
101.text: I ought to leave you here after what you did.

64.speaker: Karlach
64.text: What's that? Went after the prick who ruined my life? What would you have me do - turn tail and run?

87.speaker: Player
87.text: There's more to winning a battle than brute force. I expect you to be strategic.

55.speaker: Karlach
55.text: Well you've already won that debate. Until the Steel Watch is done away with, Gortash can't be touched.

80.speaker: Karlach
80.text: But we'll get him - won't we? Together.

89.speaker: Karlach
89.text: Good - I'm going to hold you to it.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: We may need Gortash to save the city.

86.speaker: Karlach
86.text: Then we keep him around long enough to get what we need. And not a moment longer. All right?

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: Then you better be ready to see me run him through myself.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I can live with that. Let's get out of here.

60.speaker: Karlach
60.text: Actually - could you get the boss in here to give me the go-ahead? Last thing I need's another enemy.

77.speaker: Karlach
77.text: Troop's already full, so I'll head to camp - try to work on a way to get at Gortash while I have the down time.

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: Good. I'm not in the mood to murder anyone but that fucker Gortash.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: If you're going to go rogue, you're out of the party.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: Suit yourself. I'll wait around a little, in case you come to your senses. But if you don't come make nice soon, we're finished. Officially.

71.speaker: Karlach
71.text: Go on then. I'll get out of here on my own. Been ten years alone, what's a bit more?

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I'm in charge around here; you'll do as I say.

83.speaker: Karlach
83.text: Fine. But when we get the chance to strike that arsehole where it hurts, we'll do it together - right?

40.speaker: Player
40.text: If you can't use your head, you have no place in this party.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: You're right. Let's get out of here.

59.speaker: Karlach
59.text: Thank fuck. You scared me there for a moment.

41.speaker: Karlach
41.text: Finally. Let's get out of here.

51.speaker: Karlach
51.text: Get. Me. Out of here. Now.

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Karlach, Gortash is dead. I'm sorry you weren't there.

58.speaker: Karlach
58.text: You knew how important that was to me. I'm glad he's dead - but I deserved to be there.

10.speaker: Karlach
10.text: Let's just get the fuck out of here. I'm sick to death of this place.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: First, promise you won't go rogue again.

14.speaker: Karlach
14.text: You don't control me. No one controls me. Accept that or don't.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: That's fair, Karlach. Come on, let's get out of here.

45.speaker: Karlach
45.text: Party's full. I'll wait for you at camp. Got a lot to think about anyway.
45.context: NodeContext: A little numbed out/ blunt

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Forget it, Karlach. You're not ready to work as a team.

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: I'm fine. I just went to get out of here and finish what we started.

68.speaker: Karlach
68.text: Please tell me you've seen sense.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Come on - let's get out of here.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: Thank fuck. You scared me there, you know.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I can't have you in the party if you're going to go rogue again.

84.speaker: Karlach
84.text: Gortash needs to pay. I won't act alone again, but I need you to be with me in that.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: To use your favourite word: go fuck yourself, Karlach.

34.speaker: Karlach
34.text: I'm going to pretend you didn't just say that.

74.speaker: Karlach
74.text: Are we just going to rot in here or what?

88.speaker: Karlach
88.text: What are you waiting for? Crack this cell open.

92.speaker: Karlach
92.text: What in the - we need to be out there, not in here. Let's bust this thing open - now.
